sect1.title: {textformat}
sect1.para: {textformat} is a block function used to format text. It basically cleans up spaces and special characters, and formats paragraphs by wrapping at a boundary and indenting lines.
You can set the parameters explicitly, or use a preset style. Currently email is the only available style.

row.entry: The number of chars to indent every line
The number of chars to indent the first line
The character (or string of chars) to indent with
How many characters to wrap each line to
The character (or string of chars) to break each line with
If &true;, wrap will break the line at the exact character instead of at a word boundary
The template variable the output will be assigned to
